usage: Planes fly above you in the sky.
The farmer harvested a batch of potatos
The winning team beat the losing team.
Daddy makes Kaleb a bowl of oatmeal for breakfast
Daddy likes to play catch with Kaleb.
The dog was tied to the doghouse with a chain.
Kaleb likes to chat a lot before bedtime.
The farmer feeds his chickens every morning.
Mommy told Zoe to chill out.
Kaleb punched daddy in the chin when they were wrestling.
People go to church to pray.
Kaleb likes to put cheese on his crackers.
Zoe loves to eat grapes!
There was a lot of grease on the stove after daddy made dinner.
Planes fly high up in the sky!
Zoe loves peanut butter and jelly sandwiches.
Zoe loves juice mixed into her water.
Kaleb and daddy had a wrestling match.
Playing with matches is dangerous!
Kaleb had an orange in his lunch.
Kaleb likes to pitch when he plays baseball.
Kaleb could be a pitcher on a baseball team
The farmer only grew one potato this year. It'll be a hard winter.
Barney is a big purple dinosaur!
When little boys don't wash their hands they usually get sick.
Kaleb tried to sneak a sip of daddy's soda pop.
Some trains used to run on steam. They were called steam engines!
The train passenger asked if he could switch to a window seat.
Should we sign Kaleb up to play for a soccer team?
Its not nice to tease other kids at school.
Kaleb said thanks for the snack!
If Kaleb is a good boy sometimes he gets a treat.
Maybe the toy is under the couch!
Zoe likes to wake up and watch Daniel Tiger.
A watch collector has lots of watches.
Watermelon is one of daddy's favorite foods!
When someone says thank you its nice to respond with Your Welcome!
